definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 184:a. [[עַל־דְּבַר]], [[עַל־דִּבְרֵי]] for the sake of, in reference to, v. Kö:Expositor. Aug. 1902, 142–148; and add for [[עַל־דְּבַר]] Nu 25:18, Nu 25:18, Nu 25:18, Nu 31:16, 2Sa 18:5, and for [[עַל־דִּבְרֵי]] Je 7:22, 2Ki 22:13 = 2Ch 34:21, and perh. Ps 7:1.
